§ 179. Repealed. Pub. L. 87–826, § 3, Oct. 15, 1962, 76 Stat. 953
Section, R.S. § 339; acts Mar. 3, 1875, ch. 129, § 1, 18 Stat. 352; Feb. 14, 1903, ch. 552, § 10, 32 Stat. 829; Aug. 23, 1912, ch. 350, § 1, 37 Stat. 407; Mar. 4, 1913, ch. 141, § 1, 37 Stat. 736; Mar. 1, 1919, ch. 86, 40 Stat. 1256, required quarterly reports of exports and imports. See section 301 et seq. of Title 13, Census.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective 180 days after Oct. 15, 1962, see section 4 of Pub. L. 87–826, set out as a note under section 301 of Title 13, Census.
Savings ProvisionSee section 3 of Pub. L. 87–826, set out as a note under sections 173 and 174 of this title.
